title: [GAMEPLAY] Brand Ulting not bouncing
body:
When you ult a champion that is ablaze and has no other nearby champions (but there are nearby minions) his ult fizzles out.

p-straitforward bug. easy to replicate.

also the in client 'report a bug' doesn't show up on my pvp.net

replies.body:
Hey A Hero for Hobby -

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working to get a fix in ASAP!
